creator: tom.browder@gmail.com
text:
I have a DocBook source with a long, nested, itemized list which
covers eight pages after converting to XSL-FO and running through fop
to pdf (using the fop trunk version 964941).  I am using the default page settings for USletter.

The list runs into the page footers on some pages.  The page the list
begins on is the first page of an appendix.

I have shortened the fo file as much as I can and have attached it as a zipped file.

creator: tom.browder@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 25775
fo file demonstrating list overflow

fo file is unzipped

creator: pascal.sancho@takoma.fr
text:
Created attachment 25781
shortened testacase

I've dove into the first testcase:
this issue is related to space-before.maximum within a simple list-block.
The 2nd testcase isolates the XSL-FO causing the trouble
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 46363 ***
